item.title: LeetCode Problems
item.description: Python template Tips I learned Don’t code before “design” and understand the solution algorithm First 20 problems. Spent 5 min for thinking. Next look for 2-3 different approaches. Understand. Decide. Write. Resources https://walkccc.me/LeetCode/problems/ https://books.halfrost.com/leetcode/ https://grandyang.com/leetcode/ Competitive Programmer’s Handbook
